resources.string: Does the patient have any of the following problems? If yes, then select them.
Are the following tests done? If done recently then input those values or else do the tests on the spot.
To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\".
Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
You can say any of these words \"the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog sound test\"
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
